job_tasks.phrase: help build an easy-to-use interface for our AI platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of a user interface, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: turn complex technology into clear, engaging web pages
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of creating web pages, a fundamental software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and improve our web interface using Vue 3
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states building and improving a web interface, a software development task, and mentions a specific technology (Vue 3).

job_tasks.phrase: Create interactive pages that connect smoothly with our AI services
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of interactive web pages and their integration with backend services, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with your teammates to shape a clean and effective design
job_tasks.justification: Designing the user interface and collaborating on it are part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: bring AI features to the front-end
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating AI functionalities into the user-facing application, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore new technologies and approaches to keep our platform modern and user-friendly
job_tasks.justification: Exploring and implementing new technologies to improve a platform relates to the ongoing development and maintenance of software.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure the interface is fast and responsive
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing performance and responsiveness of a software interface is a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: even when many users are online
job_tasks.justification: This phrase relates to ensuring the application can handle a large user load, which touches upon scalability and operational considerations in software deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive & Lead: We encourage the entrepreneurial spirit and are self-managed to be able to quickly grasp opportunities.
Grow & Learn: We keep evolving our innovation capabilities and help you to get the best out of yourself, both professionally and personally.
Together & Care: We love working together. We stimulate collaboration with utmost respect for each other regardless of gender, age, background, or beliefs.
Speed & Change: We are an agile and dynamic organization, that keeps adapting and knows how to respond to opportunities or change.
passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and software development
eager to shape the future of AI-driven automation.

soft_skills.phrase: Your ideas will help guide the layout and interactions to ensure a smooth experience for all users.
Work with ML engineers and back-end developers
Innovation & Experimentation: Explore new technologies and approaches
Experiment with different ideas to find what works best.

classification.rationale: This role is focused on front-end development using Vue 3, integrating AI features into a user interface. While it mentions AI technologies like LLMs and NLP, the core responsibilities and technologies are centered around software development and user interface design, not the core development or fine-tuning of AI models themselves.
